pages.text: $(li)The Apple is an eatable item that can be used to craft a $(l:patchouli:utility/quark/apple_crate)Apple Crate$(/l), $(l)Apple Pie$(), $(l)Honey Apple$() and $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/golden_apple)Golden Apple$(/l) in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/crafting_table)Crafting Table$(/l).$(br)$(li)Leaves rarely drop this item when they are broken.

$(li)This item may be cooked in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/furnace)Furnace$(/l), $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/smoker)Smoker$(/l), or $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/campfire)Campfire$(/l).$(br)$(li)Baked Apple satisfies more than an Apple.
